title: Permanent ban ( raging)
body:
i just wanted to ask for 1 more chance if it is possible and that i would like to say sorry for all that i have done in the game, and i want to keep a promise by saying if i rage again u can permanently ban my account again

but most importantly i want to ask what happens to my rp that i have put in to that account, at least could u give back the money or can i transfer that rp into another account

replies.body: Also, rp of a banned account will neither be refunded nor transferred to another account, that money is gone for good.

Since there are so many warnings given before an account is escalated to a perma-ban for toxicity, there aren't many cases where they can be lifted. You're still more than welcome to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get the full context of why your account reached this point and if anything can be done now.
